name: St. Josephs - Take care
description:
Learn a lesson what it means to take care. To take care of a home for terminally ill people. And to take care of yourself.

You have a new Job as the manager of a home for the dying. Manage the budget by replying to messages of relatives of your patients or possible donors. But also take care of yourself. This job comes with stress...

Move with WASD and Arrow keys, interact with E.

Be aware of your stress meter over your head. Take breaks from work and look for distractions to reduce stress. Make sure to pay your bills on time before additional fees are added.

There are still some bugs and the gameplay is not as deep as I wished. But the idea behind it should be made clear.

This game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 2020. The theme was Take Care.

Used software:

  • Unity Engine
  • Visual Studio 2019
  • Blender
  • Magix Music Maker
  • Sfxr
